basics.name: Darío Nicolas Tamburello
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: I am a FullStack developer with experience in JavaScript-based frameworks and libraries such as React, NodeJS, Typescript, etc, as well as .NET, C#, and both relational and non-relational databases. I am also proficient with DevOps tools like Git, Docker, and AWS. I have worked in teams of various sizes, adapting to different dynamics and work environments.

work_experience.name: Eling S.A.
tasks: Administered and maintained Windows and Unix servers, MSSQL and MySQL databases, Docker, and VMWare.
Developed and maintained JavaScript applications (NodeJS + React) for monitoring the company’s internal servers.
Responsible for Genexus and .NET applications, handling requirement analysis and task follow-up with the development team.

work_experience.name: Plum
tasks: Developed and maintained main E-commerce websites for a U.S.-based company using ASP .NET.
Focused on front-end development, improving UX/UI for both desktop and mobile versions.
Executed backend (back-office) tasks and integrated Exigo APIs (payment gateway, shipping, etc.
Managed the entire project source code through GitHub, following best practices and achieving a high approval rate in code reviews.
Collaborated with the development team using agile methodologies (Scrum) and tracked tasks through Monday.
Participated in daily stand-ups fully in English and attended meetings with the U.S. client.

work_experience.name: Freelance
tasks: IT consulting for infrastructure and application maintenance.
Developed personal and third-party projects using JavaScript-based languages: React, NodeJS, Typescript, and React Native.
